scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:server && npm run test:coverage:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:server && npm run lint:fix:client
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
